name: Slime Fisher
description:
Controls

Use WASD to move

Use E to interact (with fisherman Joe)

Left Click on a fish to hook them, continue clicking to reel them in

Walk to the dock and click "Go fishing" to begin fishing

Talk to Fisherman Joe with "E" to grab a fishing quest

Walk over to buildings around the island to upgrade them and passively catch fish

Goal

Spend your time fishing the depths of Flathead Lake Talk to Joe to upgrade your rod to be able to catch heavier and more fiesty fish. Invest in fishing buildings to begin producing fish without even needing to fish!

Quests/Upgrades

Hook Quest: Increases value of fish caught

Reel Quest: Increases click power

Bait Quest: Increases fish spawn rate

Credits
